reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stylish and feminine, with good fit and quality construction. They appreciate its flattering design, comfort, and material, with one customer noting it helps hide the tummy. The length receives mixed feedback - while some love it, others find the bodice too short. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some reporting the large size runs big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute spring/summer dress
items.body: Purchased this dress to wear for the Kentucky Oaks and it was perfect! The fit was comfortable and flowy. Perfect for spring/summertime. The long sleeves were great for cool air but not hot if the temperatures rise. True to size. Read more
items.author: Sarah H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress for the price.
items.body: This is a beautiful dress! I love the feel of the material and the flowiness of the dress. I can dress it up with heels or down with a cute pair of corks. The length is perfect and right above my knees and I am 5'4". The neckline is a bit too deep so I will probably need to be careful when I sit down or bend over :) The sleeves are the perfect length also and the sheer material makes it look more formal for business or dinners or a night out with friends. I have been looking for a dress like this to travel with for business! Read more
items.author: Bula girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the dress!
items.body: Loved the green so much that I bought it in black as well! This is such a cute dress for so many occasions. Good fit, quality material, light weight. I got so many compliments on it! I’m larger busted (32F) with a small petite frame so the tie back allowed me to adjust it comfortably for the girls while still looking elegant. Ordered a small. I’m 5’4” and 122 lbs. Read more
items.author: Cory Brown

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Pretty dress, fits nicely, the inner fabric lining is a bit cheap, but since you don’t see that it’s ok. Read more
items.author: Allison Cleveland

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress!
items.body: Love this dress. Fits true to size. I got a large. Longer than expected, but it was a good thing for me. It goes past my knees. I wore with knee high boots for a fall wedding so it felt great! Read more
items.author: JWB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress!
items.body: Pretty dress! Nice soft material. I bought the black floral. The print is nice and I received many compliments. The fit was good . At 5 9” it hits mid thigh. it’s short but not so short I have to worry about showing too much. I will purchase another one in different color Read more
items.author: A. Alba

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress
items.body: Nice dress but too much money for the quality of the material. Also, the top opens open when you move around. Could use an eye and hook to keep it closed. I would have kept it if the price point was better. It fit nicely and was flattering. Read more
items.author: Andie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a fall wedding
items.body: This was comfortable, flattering, and great for a fall wedding guest outfit. Can't wait to wear it again. I originally got a large and it was a comfortable fit but the length was too short for my preference. I went up to XL and the length was much better for me. Read more
items.author: Christina Giusti

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Solid_black, Winered, Black Golden Floral, Navy Blue Floral, Pink Floral, Apricot Red Floral, Blush Pink Floral, Red White Floral, Green Floral, Hot Pink Floral, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
